title: Episode #25: Mind-Emotions-Gut Connection
description: What happens when we stress eat? In this episode I discuss the mind-gut connections and why it is so dangerous to eat when stressed. For more info check out ch 12 and 14 in my book THINK AND EAT YOURSELF SMART: https://bit.ly/2qXA9MH
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
